answers.answer: my spouse was eating aspargus when it lodged in his throat.  He has not been unable to eat, drink or even take his required meds for high blood pressure, heart diease, COPD and diabetes. He will drink water and it gets will not go down and the water comes back up.  He has been doing this for the last 24 hours.  Should I take him to the emergency room?

question: after eating aparugus, it seem to struck in thoat, for the past 24 hours can not drink or eat anything. nothing goes down at all.
title: can not eat or drink at all nothing goes down
